content.rendered:
5 reasons why you will enjoy working with us

VINCI Construction can provide you with a wide range of opportunities to demonstrate your creativity, intellectual curiosity, daring, ambition and selflessness.

1

Building a long-term career thanks to our support, guidance and training

2

Playing your part in exciting projects in France and a hundred countries

3

Joining a responsible Group fully committed to meeting the major challenges facing today’s world

4

Being part of passionate, close-knit teams driven by the quest for excellence

5

Securing your own and your family’s well-being thanks to an attractive compensation package

They work with us

Our human resources policy focuses on integration, engagement, diversity, training and safety.

Guillaume, project manager, GTM Bâtiment

Guillaume is in charge of his first major project, in which he oversees a large number of VINCI Construction managers

“

Why work at VINCI Construction

Vladimír, Methods Director, SMP Group

Deploying the Orchestra method on a broad scale

“

Why work at VINCI Construction

Samuel, Project Director at VINCI Construction Grands Projets

Samuel Sauzon works on the Kota Kinabalu project in Borneo, Malaysia

“

Why work at VINCI Construction

See All Job Offers

excerpt.rendered: VINCI Construction designs and constructs buildings and infrastructure that meet the major challenges facing today’s society: global warming, demographic growth and the ever-increasing need for mobility.
